pullrequest.title: Use ignition transport 1.0.0 in jenkins jobs

content.raw:
I do have a question on the homebrew formula pull request

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/78

currently the latest homebrew formula is `ignition-transport1.rb`, but the `ignition-transport` alias points to `ignition-transport0`. Should I always point those aliases to the latest major version? Or should I merge the formulae?
content.html:
I do have a question on the homebrew formula pull request

  • https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/78

currently the latest homebrew formula is ignition-transport1.rb, but the ignition-transport alias points to ignition-transport0. Should I always point those aliases to the latest major version? Or should I merge the formulae?
